name.str: pair of XL fire chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL fire chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: Gauntlets crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A helmet crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants.  Covers the entire head; fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
